description: Associates an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role with an AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) certificate. This association is based on Amazon Resource Names and it enables the certificate to be used by the ACM for Nitro Enclaves application inside an enclave.

CertificateArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ACM certificate with which to associate the IAM role.
CertificateArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ACM certificate with which to associate the IAM role.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 1283  

Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:acm:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:certificate/.+$  

Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to associate with the ACM certificate. You can associate up to 16 IAM roles with an ACM certificate.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to associate with the ACM certificate. You can associate up to 16 IAM roles with an ACM certificate.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 1283  

Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:iam:.*:([0-9]{12})?:role/.+$  

Update requires: No interruption

CertificateS3BucketName.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket to which the certificate was uploaded.
CertificateS3BucketName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Amazon S3 bucket to which the certificate was uploaded.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

CertificateS3ObjectKey.description: The Amazon S3 object key where the certificate, certificate chain, and encrypted private key bundle are stored.
CertificateS3ObjectKey.markdownDescription:
The Amazon S3 object key where the certificate, certificate chain, and encrypted private key bundle are stored.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionKmsKeyId.description: The ID of the AWS KMS CMK used to encrypt the private key of the certificate.
EncryptionKmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the AWS KMS CMK used to encrypt the private key of the certificate.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption
